name: Ancestral Quest Backup Database File
summary: Learn about .AQZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Ancestral Quest enables you to record, organize, and visualize members in your family tree. When you save your information in the software by selecting File → New..., Ancestral Quest creates an AQ file to store the information. But if you want to back up your database for archival purposes, you can save an AQZ backup database by selecting File → Backup....

instructions: You can only open AQZ files with Ancestral Quest. To open an AQZ file with the software, select File → Restore....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
